WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor mail service using an external address
WorkflowInfo.Description: Monitor your mail service by sending email to external alert
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process sends a mail to an external mail address and waits for an automatic response for a pre-defined time frame. If there’s no response the Admin is alerted with SMS and IM. This process can be scheduled to run hourly to make sure your service is available.
